work.name: Basis Technologies (Formerly Centro Inc.)
work.summary:
• Led a high performing team of 6 associate to senior level technical project managers and scrum masters. Acted as a mentor to support my team in creating performant software development cross-functional teams, while coaching them to become self-organizing and self-motivating.

  • Worked closely with C-Suite and Technology Leadership to improve program processes (including SDLCs and product intake and development processes), identify, and provide proactive responses to risk, and supply detailed project information to monitor and support program goals.

  • Supported day-to-day operations and growth of a software engineering program of 157 contributors.

  • Collaborated with high-value users and customer facing teams to ensure our customers voice is heard and integrated into technology offerings. Collaborated daily with Product Managers and User Researchers, providing mentorship and end-to-end support of the product life cycle (including user interviews during ideation and beta testing).

  • Started internal program and established processes for US federal research and development tax credit, claiming $1.67 million in tax credits.

  • Implemented SPACE framework for developer productivity. Drafted and obtained approval from program and executive leadership on technical KPIs. Created automated Power BI dashboards displaying real -time technology KPIs.

  • Worked closely with a variety of functional groups including: Software Engineering, Big Data Engineering, Data Science, Production Operations, Automated & Manual Quality Assurance, UI Design, UX Research, Product Management, Customer Success, Product Marketing, Legal, and Accounting & Finance.
